entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:34 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 08:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
